name: LLM Manager
description: Multi-provider LLM Manager with RAG, Workflows & MCP Integration
author: BITHOVEN Team

changes: REFACTOR: Code sanitation - removed 190 lines of dead code from ServiceProvider
Removed registerExtensionHooks() method (ExtensionManager doesn't support static hooks)
Removed installPermissions() method (never executed, seeder handles this)
Removed uninstallPermissions() method (never executed, replaced with UninstallSeeder)
Created LLMUninstallSeeder for proper permission cleanup on uninstall
Added 'seeders.uninstall' configuration in extension.json
Updated ExtensionSeederManager with runUninstall() method
Updated ExtensionUninstaller to execute uninstall seeders before migration rollback
Confirmed LLMPermissionsSeeder is the single source of truth for permission installation
v1.0.3.migration_notes: No database changes. Code cleanup and architecture improvement only.

changes: Updated to extension.json schema v1.0.0
Added created_at and updated_at timestamps
Removed deprecated fields (menu, post_install, features)
Added category, icon, tags for marketplace
Normalized structure across all extensions
v1.0.2.migration_notes: No database changes. Configuration update only.

changes: CRITICAL FIX: Separated core data from demo seeders
Created LLMPromptTemplatesSeeder (5 essential templates)
Created LLMKnowledgeBaseSeeder (2 essential KB documents)
Refactored LLMDemoSeeder to only include demo data
Prompt Templates and Knowledge Base now populate on install
v1.0.1.migration_notes: No new migrations. Only seeder architecture changes.

changes: Initial release v3.0: LLM Orchestration Platform
Core: Multi-provider support (Ollama, OpenAI, Anthropic, Custom)
Advanced: Custom metrics, prompt templates, parameter override
Orchestration: Conversations, RAG system, multi-agent workflows
Tools: Hybrid system (Function Calling + MCP bundled + external)
MCP Bundled: 4 servers (filesystem, database, laravel, code-generation)
Security: Path whitelisting, validation, execution tracking
UI: Admin dashboard, chat interface, workflow builder, MCP management
v1.0.0.migration_notes: Creates 13 tables with llm_* prefix. Requires PHP 8.2+, Laravel 11+, Node.js 18+ for MCP servers.
